name: Pillow Heights
description:
Manage a Hotel made by pillows for pillows in Pillow Heights!

Here is a time management game inspired by Diner Dash and Cake Mania created, designed, and developed by me for a university project. 

  • Drag pillows to their hotel room
  • Flip your pillow guests when they get too hot
  • Switch Twinkle's hot and cold side to move faster or help your guests sleep longer!

All art assets used in the project are credited on the credits screen.
